languages.text: "Скорее уж печать найдется в кармане какого-нибудь богатенького коллекционера или скупщика краденного, чем на далеком мире одного из ваших соперников, шерин. Предлагаю не пренебрегать услугами торговцев во время плаваний — в моем ремесле хватает ребят с наметанным глазом. Быть может, кто-то всю жизнь ждал случая, чтобы толк... кхм, передать сию реликвию в руки законного владельца".

traits.locale_text: "Скорее уж печать найдется в кармане какого-нибудь богатенького коллекционера или скупщика краденного, чем на далеком мире одного из ваших соперников, шерин. Предлагаю не пренебрегать услугами торговцев во время плаваний — в моем ремесле хватает ребят с наметанным глазом. Быть может, кто-то всю жизнь ждал случая, чтобы толк... кхм, передать сию реликвию в руки законного владельца".

languages.text: "We have a better chance of finding the seal in the pocket of some rich collector or fence than on a remote world owned by one of your rivals, shereen. I suggest we make contact with any traders we may encounter in our travels — people in my line of work tend to have a good eye for such things. There is every possibility that someone has waited their whole life to fleece... er, to return the great relic to its rightful owner."
languages.original_text: "Скорее уж печать найдется в кармане какого-нибудь богатенького коллекционера или скупщика краденного, чем на далеком мире одного из ваших соперников, шерин. Предлагаю не пренебрегать услугами торговцев во время плаваний — в моем ремесле хватает ребят с наметанным глазом. Быть может, кто-то всю жизнь ждал случая, чтобы толк... кхм, передать сию реликвию в руки законного владельца".

"We have a better chance of finding the seal in the pocket of some rich collector or fence than on a remote world owned by one of your rivals, shereen. I suggest we make contact with any traders we may encounter in our travels — people in my line of work tend to have a good eye for such things. There is every possibility that someone has waited their whole life to fleece... er, to return the great relic to its rightful owner."

languages.text: « Nous avons plus de chances de trouver le sceau dans la poche de quelque receleur ou riche collectionneur que sur un monde lointain appartenant à l'un de vos rivaux, shereen. Je vous suggère de parler aux marchands que nous rencontrerons lors de nos pérégrinations. Ceux de mon ordre ont généralement l'œil pour ce genre de choses... et il est tout à fait possible que quelqu'un ait attendu tout ce temps pour refourg... euh, pour rendre cette relique à son propriétaire légitime. »
languages.original_text: "We have a better chance of finding the seal in the pocket of some rich collector or fence than on a remote world owned by one of your rivals, shereen. I suggest we make contact with any traders we may encounter in our travels — people in my line of work tend to have a good eye for such things. There is every possibility that someone has waited their whole life to fleece... er, to return the great relic to its rightful owner."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons plus de chances de trouver le sceau dans la poche de quelque receleur ou riche collectionneur que sur un monde lointain appartenant à l'un de vos rivaux, shereen. Je vous suggère de parler aux marchands que nous rencontrerons lors de nos pérégrinations. Ceux de mon ordre ont généralement l'œil pour ce genre de choses... et il est tout à fait possible que quelqu'un ait attendu tout ce temps pour refourg... euh, pour rendre cette relique à son propriétaire légitime. »

languages.text: “比起去你竞争对手的遥远世界，我认为我们更有可能会在某个富有的收藏家或走私犯的口袋里找到那枚印章，亲爱的。我建议，我们在旅行的过程中只要遇到商人，就问问他们这些事情。干我这行的人往往对这类事务相当敏感。很多人等了一辈子，就是为了捞……呃，就是为了把伟大的遗物归还给它原本的主人。”
languages.original_text: "We have a better chance of finding the seal in the pocket of some rich collector or fence than on a remote world owned by one of your rivals, shereen. I suggest we make contact with any traders we may encounter in our travels — people in my line of work tend to have a good eye for such things. There is every possibility that someone has waited their whole life to fleece... er, to return the great relic to its rightful owner."

traits.locale_text: “比起去你竞争对手的遥远世界，我认为我们更有可能会在某个富有的收藏家或走私犯的口袋里找到那枚印章，亲爱的。我建议，我们在旅行的过程中只要遇到商人，就问问他们这些事情。干我这行的人往往对这类事务相当敏感。很多人等了一辈子，就是为了捞……呃，就是为了把伟大的遗物归还给它原本的主人。”

languages.text: "Wir haben bessere Aussichten, das Siegel in der Tasche eines reichen Sammlers oder Hehlers zu finden als auf einer abgelegenen Welt im Besitz eines Eurer Rivalen, Shereen. Ich schlage vor, wir nehmen Kontakt zu jedem Händler auf, dem wir auf unseren Reisen begegnen. Leute in meinem Metier haben meist ein gutes Auge für solche Dinge. Es ist gut möglich, dass jemand schon sein ganzes Leben lang darauf wartet, den Besitzer dieses großartigen Relikts zu schröpf- ... äh, ausfindig zu machen, um ihm sein Hab und Gut zurückzugeben."
languages.original_text: "We have a better chance of finding the seal in the pocket of some rich collector or fence than on a remote world owned by one of your rivals, shereen. I suggest we make contact with any traders we may encounter in our travels — people in my line of work tend to have a good eye for such things. There is every possibility that someone has waited their whole life to fleece... er, to return the great relic to its rightful owner."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben bessere Aussichten, das Siegel in der Tasche eines reichen Sammlers oder Hehlers zu finden als auf einer abgelegenen Welt im Besitz eines Eurer Rivalen, Shereen. Ich schlage vor, wir nehmen Kontakt zu jedem Händler auf, dem wir auf unseren Reisen begegnen. Leute in meinem Metier haben meist ein gutes Auge für solche Dinge. Es ist gut möglich, dass jemand schon sein ganzes Leben lang darauf wartet, den Besitzer dieses großartigen Relikts zu schröpf- ... äh, ausfindig zu machen, um ihm sein Hab und Gut zurückzugeben."

languages.text: «Encontraríamos antes el sello en los bolsillos de algún coleccionista o perista de riquezas que en un mundo remoto de uno de sus rivales, shereen. Le recomiendo hablar con cualquier comerciante que nos encontremos en nuestros viajes; la gente de mi gremio suele tener ojo para esas cosas. Cabe la posibilidad de que haya alguien que lleve esperando toda su vida desplumar... eh, devolver esta gran reliquia a su legítimo heredero».
languages.original_text: "We have a better chance of finding the seal in the pocket of some rich collector or fence than on a remote world owned by one of your rivals, shereen. I suggest we make contact with any traders we may encounter in our travels — people in my line of work tend to have a good eye for such things. There is every possibility that someone has waited their whole life to fleece... er, to return the great relic to its rightful owner."

traits.locale_text: «Encontraríamos antes el sello en los bolsillos de algún coleccionista o perista de riquezas que en un mundo remoto de uno de sus rivales, shereen. Le recomiendo hablar con cualquier comerciante que nos encontremos en nuestros viajes; la gente de mi gremio suele tener ojo para esas cosas. Cabe la posibilidad de que haya alguien que lleve esperando toda su vida desplumar... eh, devolver esta gran reliquia a su legítimo heredero».

languages.text: 「あるいは、あなたのライバルの一人が所有する辺境の世界にではなく、裕福なコレクターまたは盗品故買者のポケットの中に印章を見つける可能性の方が高いと思うわ、シャリーン。旅の途中で出会う商人と連絡を取ることを提案するわ。あたしのような生業をしている者たちは、その手のものを見る目があるという傾向があるの。誰かがこの偉大な遺物を生涯を賭けて騙し取る…いいえ、正統な持ち主に返すことを待ち望んでいる可能性は十分にあると思うわ」
languages.original_text: "We have a better chance of finding the seal in the pocket of some rich collector or fence than on a remote world owned by one of your rivals, shereen. I suggest we make contact with any traders we may encounter in our travels — people in my line of work tend to have a good eye for such things. There is every possibility that someone has waited their whole life to fleece... er, to return the great relic to its rightful owner."

traits.locale_text: 「あるいは、あなたのライバルの一人が所有する辺境の世界にではなく、裕福なコレクターまたは盗品故買者のポケットの中に印章を見つける可能性の方が高いと思うわ、シャリーン。旅の途中で出会う商人と連絡を取ることを提案するわ。あたしのような生業をしている者たちは、その手のものを見る目があるという傾向があるの。誰かがこの偉大な遺物を生涯を賭けて騙し取る…いいえ、正統な持ち主に返すことを待ち望んでいる可能性は十分にあると思うわ」

languages.text: "O mührü, ensesi kalın bir koleksiyoncunun veya kaçakçının cebinde bulma ihtimalimiz, rakiplerinden birinin uzak bir dünyasında bulma ihtimalimizden fazladır şirinim. Bence seyahatlerimizde karşımıza çıkan tüm tacirlerle irtibata geçelim... Bizim meslektekiler, bu tarz şeyleri kaçırmaz. Belki de birileri, tam da kazıklayacak... Şey, tam da bu ulu yadigârı hak sahibine kavuşturmak için can atıyordur."
languages.original_text: "We have a better chance of finding the seal in the pocket of some rich collector or fence than on a remote world owned by one of your rivals, shereen. I suggest we make contact with any traders we may encounter in our travels — people in my line of work tend to have a good eye for such things. There is every possibility that someone has waited their whole life to fleece... er, to return the great relic to its rightful owner."

Bence seyahatlerimizde karşımıza çıkan tüm tacirlerle irtibata geçelim... Bizim meslektekiler, bu tarz şeyleri kaçırmaz. Belki de birileri, tam da kazıklayacak...
